patthana12.16:4.3: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana12.16:7.3: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana12.16:8.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana12.16:10.3: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana12.16:11.1: Nasaraṇaṃ naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ….
patthana12.16:12.1: Nasaraṇaṃ naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca … pe …
patthana12.16:12.3: nasaraṇaṃ naāsavavippayuttañceva nano ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ….
patthana12.16:14.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
